personal.headline: Python Developer & DevOps Engineer
personal.summary: Python Developer and DevOps Engineer with expertise in building scalable backend systems, event-driven architectures, and cloud-native infrastructure. Experienced with FastAPI, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.description: Designed and implemented event-driven microservices using FastAPI, Celery, and RabbitMQ. Reduced API response times by 40% through Redis caching and query optimization.
Containerized applications with Docker, deployed to Kubernetes clusters, and built CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions. Achieved 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: Portfolio CV App
projects.description: Full-stack portfolio application demonstrating FastAPI + React + CQRS + Docker + Kubernetes + AI Chat. Features event-driven architecture with RabbitMQ, Redis caching, Celery workers, and a RAG-based AI assistant.
